list.title: BeatLeader
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader API using this NPM wrapper library. Currently supports all BeatLeader endpoints found under BeatLeaderAPI v1.

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader Clan API endpoints

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.get
list.description: Retrieves a list of clans based on filters

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.getById
list.description: Fetches details of a specific clan identified by its ID.

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.getByTag
list.description: Retrieves details of a specific clan by tag

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.getGlobalMap
list.description: Fetches a global map showing clan captured maps and rankings.

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.getMapsById
list.description: Fetches ranked maps(maps that can be captured on the global map) for where players of clan made scores identified by its ID, with optional sorting and filtering.

list.title: BeatLeader.Clans.getMapsByTag
list.description: Retrieves a list of clans based on filters

list.title: BeatLeader.Leaderboards
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader Leaderboard API endpoints

list.title: BeatLeader.Leaderboards.get
list.description: Retrieves a list of leaderboards

list.title: BeatLeader.Leaderboards.getById
list.description: Retrieves a list of leaderboards

list.title: BeatLeader.Leaderboards.getClanRankingsById
list.description: Retrieves clan rankings for a leaderboard

list.title: BeatLeader.Leaderboards.getScoregraphById
list.description: Retrieves the score graph for a leaderboard

list.title: BeatLeader.Modifiers
list.description: Interact with BeatLeader Modifiers API endpoints

list.title: BeatLeader.Modifiers.get
list.description: Provides a list of Beat Saber modifiers and their associated score multiplier values. This is legacy support, for the recent values please use modifierValues and modifierRatings on leaderboards.

list.title: BeatLeader.Players
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader Players API endpoints

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader Player API endpoints

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.get
list.description: Get profile data for a specific user based on their ID

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getByBeatSaverId
list.description: Get profile data for a specific user based on their BeatSaver ID

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getByDiscordId
list.description: Get profile data for a specific user based on their Discord ID

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getByPatreonId
list.description: Get profile data for a specific user based on their Patreon ID

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getFollowerInfoById
list.description: Retrieves an info about player' followers such as count and 3 closest followers. Also 3 most followed players this player follows

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getFollowersById
list.description: Retrieves a full list of player' followers and players this player follow.

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getFoundedClanById
list.description: Retrieves an information about the clan this player created and manage.

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getParticipatedEventsById
list.description: Get events a user has participated in based on their ID

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Player.getRankedMapsById
list.description: Returns brief stats about maps this player ranked, like count, total PP gained, etc...

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores
list.description: Interact with the BeatLeader Player Scores API endpoints. Get player score related info.

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getAccGraph
list.description: Retrieves accuracy graph data

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getById
list.description: Fetches a list of scores for a specific user based on filters

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getCompactById
list.description: Retrieves a paginated list of scores for a specific user

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getHistory
list.description: Retrieves a lkist of players performance metrics and statistics

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getPinnedScores
list.description: Retrieves a paginated list of pinned scores for a specific user

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.Scores.getScore
list.description: Gets a score made my a player on a specific map of a specific difficulty

list.title: BeatLeader.Players.get
list.description: Retrieves a list of players based on filters

list.title: ScoreSaber
list.description: Interact with the ScoreSaber API using this NPM wrapper library. Currently supports all ScoreSaber endpoints except for authenticated routes to include: Website User, Website Auth, and Ranking Team, QAT, and NAT routes.

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard
list.description: Allows interaction with the ScoreSaber Leaderboard API endpoints

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.difficultiesByHash
list.description: Gets a maps difficulties based on hash

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.get
list.description: Gets a list of leaderboards based on filters

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.infoByHash
list.description: Gets leaderboard info based on map hash

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.infoById
list.description: Gets leaderboard information based on leaderboard id

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.scoresByHash
list.description: Gets a list of scores for a given hash

list.title: ScoreSaber.Leaderboard.scoresById
list.description: Gets a list of scores for a given map

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players
list.description: Allows interaction with the ScoreSaber Player API endpoints

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players.basicInfoById
list.description: Returns basic player info

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players.count
list.description: Returns an integer value of the number of players based on filters

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players.fullInfoById
list.description: Returns full player info

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players.get
list.description: Gets a list of players based on filters

list.title: ScoreSaber.Players.scoresById
list.description: Returns a list of a players scores

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking
list.description: Allows interaction with the ScoreSaber Ranking API endpoints

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking.Public
list.description: Allows interaction with the publically available ScoreSaber Ranking API endpoints (not ranking team related functions)

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking.Public.belowTop
list.description: Gets the rest of the rank requests

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking.Public.getRequestInfoByLeaderboardId
list.description: Gets rank request info based on a Leaderboard ID

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking.Public.getRequestInfoByRequestId
list.description: Gets rank request info based on request ID

list.title: ScoreSaber.Ranking.Public.top
list.description: Gets the top 6 rank requests
